mapper.insert: insert into t_feed set iuser = #{iuser}, contents = #{contents}, location = #{location}
mapper.select: select A.ifeed, A.contents, A.location, A.created_at AS createdAt, B.iuser AS writerIuser, B.nm AS writerNm, B.pic AS writerPic from t_feed AS A inner join t_user AS B on A.iuser = B.iuser order by A.ifeed desc limit #{startIdx}, #{rowCount}
